name: Coyote
description: A medium canine with a slender build and prominent erect pointed ears.

abilities.name: Pack Hunter
abilities.description: Deals +1 damage when ally is near.

name: Snapping Turtle, Giant
description: An overly aggressive, large, turle with a powerful beak-like jaw.

abilities.name: Clamp
abilities.description: Target is immobilized until the creature's next attack.

name: Skeleton Acrolyte
description: A skeleton with tattered robes and a rusted blade.

abilities.name: Death Throes
abilities.description: Upon death, living within near take 1 point of damage while undead heal 1 point.

name: Skeleton Champion
description: A heavily armored skeleon with a rusted blade and shield in hand.

name: Skeleton Priest
description: A skeleton with an unholy symbol draped around its neck and dagger in hand.

spells.name: Inflict Wounds (WIS)
spells.description: DC 11. Touch a living creature and deal 2d6 damage.

spells.name: Holy Weapon (WIS)
spells.description: DC 11. Targeted weapon has a +1 to attack and damage rolls.

spells.name: Shield of Faith (WIS)
spells.description: DC 11. Gains a +2 to armor class.

name: Deathlock
description: After failing to fulfill their pact, something new has arisen full of hatred and malice for the living.

abilities.name: Greater Undead
abilities.description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by silver or magical sources.

abilities.name: Dual Spellcasting
abilities.description: Able to cast both Priest and Wizard spells with CHR.

spells.name: Inflict Wounds (CHR)
spells.description: DC 11. Touch a living creature and deal 3d6 damage.

spells.name: Shield of Faith (CHR)
spells.description: DC 11. Gains a +2 to armor class.

spells.name: Chilling Touch (CHR)
spells.description: DC 11. Deal 1d4 damage, target becomes weakened on a failed DC11 CON save.

spells.name: Death Knell (CHR)
spells.description: DC 12. Each creatures that dies within near grants a +1 caster level checks, attack rolls, and heals 1d6.

name: Wood Woad
description: Powerful, tree-like guardians that are sworn to defend the forest.

abilities.name: Regenerate
abilities.description: Regains 1d4 hit points on its turn.

abilities.name: Tree Stride
abilities.description: Step inside a tree, then move from tree to tree within far distance.

name: Ghoul Harpy
description: A foul, hideous harpy that has met it's end but refuses to stop sowing chaos.

abilities.name: Song
abilities.description: Living within double near DC 13 CHA or sickened for 1d4 rounds. Immune for 1 day if passed check.
